original_text:
Dim Sum Prize
Una delle ultime mode in fatto di gastronomia è rappresentata senza ombra di dubbio la cucina orientale, con ristoranti cinesi ormai diventati una valida opzione ogni volta che decidiamo di mangiare fuori. Con il termine Dim Sum si intendono delle pietanze leggere che di solito vengono servite nei tipici piatti di bambù insieme al tè cinese. Tra i piatti tipici troviamo i Sim Mai, piccoli ravioli di carne cotti al vapore, gli Hai Gow a base di gamberi, Bao con pollo e zenzero, involtini primavera, zuppe con spaghetti di soia, e tanti altri piatti tipici di questa tradizione culinaria di successo. Per rendere al meglio la bontà di questo cibo, la Betsoft ha utilizzato una grafica imponente, tanto che ci basta uno sguardo alla slot per sentire l’acquolina alla bocca. I rulli si trovano all0interno di un chiosco cinese, con i simboli sospesi che sembrano galleggiare nell’aria. Nella parte bassa della griglia di gioco troviamo tutti i pulsanti che ci permettono di accedere alle impostazioni e di settare al meglio la nostra scommessa.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La griglia di gioco ha un taglio tradizionale con 5 rulli e 3 righe. Le linee di pagamento sono 10 e fisse, con la scommessa minima che va da un minimo di 0,05 € sino a un massimo di 22,50 € per spin. Con Dim Sum Prize è inoltre possibile scegliere un numero di giri automatici compresi tra 5 e 100. Punto forte di questa slot è il valore RTP, pari al 97,18%, laddove di solito consideriamo buono quando raggiunge il 96%.
Simboli e funzionalità di Dim Sum Prize
Cominciamo subito col dire che in Dim Sum Prize non troverete simboli non tematici come quelli legati al gioco delle carte, ma solo pietanze tipiche cinesi. Si vince quando su una linea di pagamento appaiono almeno 3 simboli identici e adiacenti, a partire da sinistra verso destra. Tra i vari simboli che pagano bene troviamo il Ji baozi, ravioli farciti di pollo, Il Changfen e il Chizi feng zhao, anche se il simbolo che vale di più in assoluto è il Congee, un porridge di riso davvero appetitoso.
Tra i simboli speciali troviamo i biglietti Coupon, se ne appaiono 3 si ha diritto a 5 giri gratuiti. Se simboli Coupon compaiono durante i giri gratuiti, essi si trasformeranno in Teatime Wild, ossia la teiera fumante servita su un vassoio di bambù. tali simboli poi rimarranno fissi sui rulli durante tutti i Free Spins. Ogni volta che apparirà un ulteriore Teatime Wild, si avrà diritto a un giro gratuito aggiuntivo.
Un altro simbolo speciale è il Bamboo Basket Surprise, un cestino di Bambù che aprendosi rivelerà un Crimson Coupon, un Teatime Wild o Free Spins.

raw_translation.response:
As an experienced gambler, you know that one of the latest gastronomic trends is without a doubt oriental cuisine, with Chinese restaurants now a valid option every time we decide to eat out. "Dim Sum" refers to light dishes that are usually served in typical bamboo plates with Chinese tea. Among the typical dishes are Sim Mai, small steamed meat dumplings, Hai Gow with shrimp, Bao with chicken and ginger, spring rolls, soup with vermicelli, and many other typical dishes of this successful culinary tradition. Betsoft has used impressive graphics to showcase the deliciousness of this food. The reels are located inside a Chinese kiosk, with suspended symbols that seem to float in the air. At the bottom of the game grid, we find all the buttons that allow us to access the settings and set our bet to the best.

For those who enjoy traditional 5-reel and 3-row slot machines, this game offers 10 fixed paylines with a minimum bet of €0.05 and a maximum of €22.50 per spin. You can also choose a number of automatic spins between 5 and 100. One of the main features of this slot is its RTP value, which is 97.18%, where we consider a good RTP value to be around 96%.

As an experienced gambler, you'll be happy to know that in Dim Sum Prize, you'll only find themed symbols of typical Chinese dishes such as Ji baozi, steamed chicken dumplings, Changfen, and Chizi feng zhao. The symbol that pays the most is the Congee, a delicious rice porridge. When at least 3 identical and adjacent symbols appear on a payline, you win.

Among the special symbols, we find the Coupon tickets, and if 3 of them appear, you are entitled to 5 free spins. If Coupon symbols appear during the free spins, they will turn into Teatime Wild, which is the steaming teapot served on a bamboo tray. These symbols then remain fixed on the reels during all Free Spins. Every time an additional Teatime Wild appears, you are entitled to an additional free spin.

Another special symbol is the Bamboo Basket Surprise, a bamboo basket that opens to reveal a Crimson Coupon, a Teatime Wild, or free spins. So, give Dim Sum Prize a spin and satisfy your appetite for big wins!

Review: Dim Sum Prize

As an experienced gambler, you know that the latest craze in gastronomy is without a doubt the oriental cuisine, with Chinese restaurants now a valid option whenever we decide to eat out. The term Dim Sum refers to light dishes that usually come served in typical bamboo dishes along with Chinese tea. Among the typical dishes, we find Sim Mai, small steamed meat dumplings, Hai Gow made with shrimp, Bao with chicken and ginger, spring rolls, soups with soy noodles, and many other typical dishes of this successful culinary tradition. To best convey the goodness of this food, Betsoft has used impressive graphics, so much so that a glance at the slot is enough to make our mouths water. The reels are located inside a Chinese kiosk, with symbols suspended that seem to float in the air. At the bottom of the game grid we find all the buttons that allow us to access the settings and to set our bet in the best way possible.

Main Features of the Slot Machine

The game grid has a traditional cut with 5 reels and 3 rows. The paylines are 10 and fixed, with the minimum bet ranging from a minimum of €0.05 up to a maximum of €22.50 per spin. With Dim Sum Prize, it is also possible to choose a number of automatic spins between 5 and 100. The strong point of this slot is the RTP value, which is 97.18%, a good number for experienced players, who know that anything above 96% is already a great score.

Symbols and Features of Dim Sum Prize

Let's start by saying that in Dim Sum Prize you won't find non-themed symbols like those related to the game of cards, but only typical Chinese dishes. You win when at least 3 identical and adjacent symbols appear on a payline, starting from left to right. Among the various symbols that pay well, we find Ji baozi, chicken stuffed dumplings, Changfen and Chizi feng zhao, although the symbol that is worth the most is Congee, a truly appetizing rice porridge.

Among the special symbols, we find the Coupon tickets; if 3 of them appear, you are entitled to 5 free spins. If Coupon symbols appear during the free spins, they will turn into a Teatime Wild, the steaming teapot served on a bamboo tray. These symbols will then remain fixed on the reels during all the free spins. Every time an additional Teatime Wild appears, you are entitled to an additional free spin.

Another special symbol is the Bamboo Basket Surprise, a bamboo basket that, when opened, reveals a Crimson Coupon, a Teatime Wild or free spins. As an experienced gambler, you know that this is not just a slot game, but a real culinary experience that will make you taste all the delicious flavors of the East!
